title: League of Legends won't open for me.
body: I've tried opening it about 4-5 times, and the logo will pop up for a second then disappear but the launcher doesn't show up, so i can't repair, what do i do?

replies.body:
Does this persist after a full restart?

If so, try deleting the exe for league (not the entire install) and running the installer again to repair registry (registry cleaners are baaaaad).
If you recently updated any anti-virus software, temporarily disable it and try running the game, if that works, add an exception to the program.
If you are using any "performance booster" programs, uninstall them, they are snake oil and typically only cause instability, if they do anything at all.
If you are using windows 8, burn your computer or install a real OS.
If you are using windows 10, look up how to fix windows 10 so it is not an unstable piece of flaming garbage.

Similarly, roll back any driver updates, if they happened around the time the isuse started.

If none of this works, try a full uninstall and reinstall of the game, if you are unable to access repair.
CTRL ALT DELETE, task manager, and locate "League.client" and end the task. Broken version of it might be running in background. had this problem today.
